char_Elder.name: Elder
0: Oh, child. You finally asleep...
Look at the sky, see how endless it is?
There is no stars left, cause the Gods are angry at us...
No one would sacrifice anything to reach one.
You need to restore the sky so we all could see again.
Find something that would worth to sacricfice,
And find the right place to perform the ritual.
1: Search the forest to find this fruit,
It will glow in the dark with it's bright orange color.
Then find the carved stone, with strange symbol on it.
Bring the fruit to the altar, and place it on the top,
